jobs.title: Business Development & Marketing Automation Intern
jobs.description:
A fashion consulting firm in startup stage with a growing team from some of the top universities and institutions is looking for a dedicated and top notch seller and Business Developer. You are passionate about B2B sales, client relationship, account management, sales process and pipeline, marketing automation and CRM with prior experience; motivated with the startup mindset. This role has the potential to grow into the NY regional head and other management roles within a few months for the top candidate as the business continues expanding internationally.

We set our bars high in building a premier global management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele – leading and emerging luxury/fashion brands, fashion media, online companies and brands. We offer a combination of traditional services such as fashion PR, celebrity marketing, branding, global marketing communication, retail strategy, fashion creatives as well as social media growth/influencer marketing, Ecommerce, growth and digital strategy, fashion tech, innovative store concepts, financial analysis, supply chain/operations/merchandising strategy and data analytics.

Company leadership has experience with luxury fashion brands, celebrity designers, leading fortune 500 media/entertainment companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Your Background -
Has prior business development or B2B sales and marketing, CRM experience. Psychology, sales or marketing major; candidates major in business or art from leading universities and institutes; or other candidates with strong B2B selling and relationship building acumen.

Responsibilities -
*Support strategic initiatives that drive client accounts and revenue growth for the company.

Research to come up with targeted prospect list and contact info.

Use a combination of direct personal approach, email, automated marketing and cold calling to generate leads, create sales pipelines and prospect conversion processes.

Qualify and help convert leads into clients through follow-up calls, emails, participating in client meetings and other strategic approaches.

Develop strategies to follow up, engage with prospective clients and help close the sale.

Develop and maintain strong relationship with prospect and future clients.

Create marketing campaigns, deploy marketing systems to automate and optimize the lead generation and prospecting process.

Familiar with CRM and marketing automation systems such as Salesforce, Hubspot, Eloqua, Acquisio etc. for sales lead tracking, management and reporting.

Brainstorm with the team to create business development strategies and sales techniques.

Excellent verbal, written and presentation skills. Great at building, cultivating and maintaining relationship.

A multi-tasker with excellent time management skills who thrives in a fast paced sales environment.

Hardworking and willing to do whatever it takes to achieve sales goals and be successful.*

Potential Clients -
Major fashion companies/brands, luxury brands and celebrity designers, media companies, online brands, other consulting firms and agencies.

Location –
The company has a remote structure and remote culture. Ideally candidates would be in these five cities: New York, Paris, London, Los Angeles, Stockholm. Candidates can however be 100% remote. Being in these major cities comes with the benefits of participating in face to face meetings and planning. You should be able to start in the next couple of weeks in order to apply.
Note: candidates in Paris, London, Stockholm and LA can also apply to this role.

Availability –
Can dedicate at least 2-3 days a week on this adventure.

Compensation –
Unpaid first with the potential to grow into commission and salaried role.

About US –
Haus of Jaeger is set to become a premier, multi-division fashion strategy consulting firm. The firm starts with its core strategy division: PR, branding, communications, celebrity/media/ influencer relations, social media, global marketing communications, fashion media, growth & digital strategy. It will then grow with a new fashion creative division in short form content, visual art and TV show production.

We set our bars high in building a premier management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele – leading and emerging luxury fashion brands. Company leadership has experience with celebrity designers, luxury fashion brands, leading fortune 500 media companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Past companies we worked with include: Vanity Fair, Saks Fifth Avenue, Prabal Gurung, John Varvatos, True Religion, Rag & Bone, Scott Kay, 7 for All Mankind, J Brand, Lululemon, Splendid, Ella Moss, Nicole Miller, Hudson Jeans, J.Lindberg, Rich & Skinny, Paige Denim, C&C California, Vivienne Hu, Fox, Disney, Sony Pictures Entertainment, AT&T Entertainment Group, InterActive Corp, Deloitte etc.

The brands of products dealt with: Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Gucci, Dior, Valentino, Bottega Veneta, Christian Louboutin, Prada, Dolce&Gabbana, Saint Laurent, Burberry, Fendi, Jimmy Choo, Salvatore Ferragamo, Moschino, Giuseppe Zanotti, Judith Leiber, Celine, Loewe, Balenciaga, Moynat, Versace, Givenchy, Missoni, Ted Baker, Stella McCartney, Stuart Weitzman, Moncler, The Row, Tory Burch, Alexander McQueen etc.

Company leader has been trained with some of the most successful business leaders and celebrity entrepreneurs such as Steve Wozniak, Sylvester Stallone, Tony Robbins, Michael Douglas, Dr. Phil, Mark Wahlberg, Bethenny Frankel, Pitbull, Jessica Simpson, Charlie Sheen, Huge Hilton, George Ross, Gene Simmons, John Travolta, Christie Brinkley, Lubov Azria, Emily Weiss etc.

About Haus Of Jaeger

Haus of Jaeger is a premier, multi-division fashion strategy consulting firm. We set our bars high in building a premier management consulting firm in luxury & fashion with top clienteles – top luxury & fashion companies, established and emerging luxury brands, major media and online brands. 
Company leadership has experience with celebrity designers, luxury fashion brands and retail stores, leading fortune 500 media companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs. 

Unlike most consultancies or agencies in the industry, Haus of Jaeger is backed by fortune 500, leading media companies experience and a strong digital marketing strategy background in marketing mix, cross channel, Ecommerce, targeting and analytics, in addition to our over 10 years of fashion/nonprofit industry experience, luxury brands, PR, celebrity and media relations, fashion media, global marketing communications, retail and creative directions expertise. 

Past companies we worked with include: Vanity Fair, Saks Fifth Avenue, Prabal Gurung, John Varvatos, True Religion, Rag & Bone, Scott Kay, 7 for All Mankind, J Brand, Lululemon, Splendid, Ella Moss, Nicole Miller, Hudson Jeans, J.Lindberg, Rich & Skinny, Paige Denim, C&C California, Fox, Disney, Sony Pictures Entertainment, AT&T Entertainment Group, InterActive Corp, Deloitte etc. 

Brands of products dealt with: Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Gucci, Dior, Valentino, Bottega Veneta, Christian Louboutin, Prada, Dolce&Gabbana, Saint Laurent, Burberry, Fendi, Jimmy Choo, Salvatore Ferragamo, Moschino, Giuseppe Zanotti, Judith Leiber, Celine, Loewe, Balenciaga, Moynat, Versace, Givenchy, Missoni, Ted Baker, Stella McCartney, Stuart Weitzman, Moncler, The Row, Tory Burch, Alexander McQueen etc. 

Company leader has been trained with some of the most successful business leaders and celebrity entrepreneurs such as Steve Wozniak, Sylvester Stallone, Tony Robbins, Michael Douglas, Dr. Phil, Mark Wahlberg, Bethenny Frankel, Pitbull, Jessica Simpson, Charlie Sheen, Huge Hilton, George Ross, Gene Simmons, John Travolta, Christie Brinkley, Lubov Azria, Emily Weiss etc.

jobs.title: Fashion Consulting Intern
jobs.description:
A fashion consulting firm in startup stage with a growing team from some of the top universities and institutions is looking for a dedicated and intelligent consultant as Fashion Consulting Intern. You are passionate about fashion, Ecommerce, PR, branding, social media growth, multi-channel marketing, growth/digital/retail strategy, merchandising and supply chain, content creation and fashion creatives; motivated with the startup mindset. This role has the potential to grow into head and other management roles within a few months for the top candidate as the business continues expanding internationally.

We set our bars high in building a premier global management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele – leading and emerging luxury/fashion brands, fashion media, online companies and brands. We offer a combination of traditional services such as fashion PR, celebrity marketing, branding, global marketing communication, retail strategy, fashion creatives as well as growth and digital strategy, social media growth and content strategy, influencer marketing, Ecommerce, fashion tech, innovative store concepts, financial analysis, supply chain/operations/merchandising strategy and data analytics.

Company leadership has experience with luxury fashion brands, celebrity designers, leading fortune 500 media/entertainment companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Your Background -
Candidates major in business, marketing, fashion, art, economics, finance, psychology, technology (fashion tech, Ecommerce technology, future store concepts, retail technology, virtual reality, augmented reality, hologram, robotics, 3D etc.) and data analytics (statistics, AI, machine learning, web/social media analytics, big data) or other relevant fields from top universities and fashion/art institutes.

Who should apply:
Those who specializes or is talented in at least one or more of the following areas –
*Branding, Growth strategy, digital strategy
Market research, competitive analysis
Marketing strategy, digital marketing
Fashion PR, celebrity marketing, event organization, nonprofit initiatives
Marketing technologies, marketing intelligence
Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts
Retail strategy, trend forecasting, merchandising, supply chain, buying, production process and operations
Social media, influencer marketing, Content creation
Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook
Business development, account management, B2B sales
Statistics, AI, machine learning, analytics, big data, forecasting, personalization, segmentation
Business management, strategic consulting
Global marketing communications
Financial analysis, equity research, PE, M&A
Fashion media, fashion writing
Creative direction, art direction
TV production
Digital arts, visual arts
Photography, videography

Responsibilities:
Support both in house and client facing responsibilities whether it is market research, marketing strategy, social media, consulting, growth and digital strategy, business development and client relations, content creation, merchandising, supply chain, operations, buying.

Assisting the Managing Director and help in various aspects of planning, preparation, logistics and operation of the business to facilitate various business activities.

Management consulting: strategically advise and consult clients on growth strategy.

Branding: brainstorm and come up with branding ideas for the company and the clients.

Growth and digital strategy, marketing mix, digital marketing, operation and supply chain: use a combination of marketing, cross channel, operational, product, financial & data analytics measures to help our clients grow their business and revenue. Find the right marketing mix and supply chain/operational model.

Market research and competitive analysis, marketing strategy: conduct exhaustive market research and SWOT analysis to come up with business strategies and competitive advantages for the company and clients. Work with the finance and data analytics team to come up with creative and innovative marketing strategies and ideas.

Fashion PR: research to find the right editors and publications to pitch about the company itself for news coverage and interviews. Research to pitch and land speaking engagement for the company at conferences and events. Find opportunities for collaborations and partnership. Outreaches to grow the firm.

Fashion PR consulting: Provide PR service to the clients. Pitch media and land product placement. Celebrity seeding and red carpet dressing. Write press releases and pitches.Event planning. 

Event organization, nonprofit initiatives: fashion and gala event organization. Celebrity relations. Nonprofit initiatives for the company and clients.

Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts: familiar with Ecommerce management, strategy and the latest technologies in Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts. Come up with innovative retail store or shopping concepts for clients.

Social media growth and content strategy, influencer marketing: Managing social media, partnership and influencer activities to raise awareness of the firm and promote our consulting services. Build and grow a community with potential clients and advocates. Increase audience engagement. 

Provide social media and influencer marketing services to the clients. Help clients with their social media account growth, content creation and strategy.
Retail, supply chain, merchandising, operations strategy

Financial and economic analysis, equity research, private equity, M&A: analyze potential client performance through annual report, balance sheet, income statement and other equity research. Identify problems and opportunities for improvement. Work together with the market research and marketing strategy team to tie prospects’ issues and problems with potential revenue gains through our solutions. Private equity and M&A analysis to identify business expansion and investment opportunities. Statistics number crunching.

Data analytics: expert in statistics, AI, machine learning technologies and marketing intelligence to help clients gain insights and better forecast, segment, target and personalize their customers’experience.
Technology: expertise in fashion tech, Ecommerce technology, future store concepts, retail technology, virtual reality, augmented reality, hologram, robotics, 3D etc.

Create sales and marketing process/pipelines to help market the firm’s services to potential clients. Deploy marketing technologies to make the process efficient and effective.

Business development and client relations: identify opportunities to grow the company client base; conduct sales and marketing activities to generate leads and turn prospects into clients. Build and maintain relationship with fashion brands and companies. An excellent communicator and relationship builder.

Fashion editorial: write editorial blog posts with superb content in fashion, styling, beauty, society, luxury and art along with high quality photos and videos. An ideal candidate must have a strong personality, unique thinking styles and creativity to write pieces with great and distinguished fashion and style content that fits into the brand niche and image. 

Creative and art direction: direct and identify designs and editorials that will enhance the brand’s image and merchandise sales.

Fashion creative: demonstrate exceptional creative talent. Create fashion editorial, digital arts, special effect and videos content for the company and clients. 

Keep up to date with the latest fashion tech, Ecommerce, social media, fashion PR, branding, marketing and consulting trends and technologies. Up to date with fashion industry business and news, celebrity, styles and trends.

The ideal candidate is highly intelligent and a quick self-learner, hardworking and dedicated, proactive and an initiative taker, creative, strategic and a good communicator.*

Potential Clients -
Major fashion companies/brands, luxury brands and celebrity designers, media companies, online brands, other consulting firms and agencies.

Location –
The company has a remote structure and remote culture. Ideally candidates would be in these five cities: New York, Paris, London, Los Angeles, Stockholm. Candidates can however be 100% remote. Being in these major cities comes with the benefits of participating in face to face meetings and planning. You should be able to start in the next couple of weeks in order to apply.

Note: candidates in Paris, London, Stockholm and LA can also apply to this role.

Availability –
Can dedicate at least 2-3 days a week on this adventure.

Compensation –
Unpaid first with the potential to grow into commission and salaried role.

About US –
Haus of Jaeger is set to become a premier, multi-divisional fashion strategy consulting firm. The firm starts with its core strategy division: PR, branding, communications, celebrity/media/ influencer relations, social media, global marketing communications, fashion media, growth & digital strategy. It will then grow with a new fashion creative division in short form content, visual art and TV production.

We set our bars high in building a premier management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele – big fashion companies, established and emerging luxury brands, major fashion media. Company leadership has experience with celebrity designers, luxury fashion brands, leading fortune 500 media/entertainment companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Past companies we worked with include: Vanity Fair, Saks Fifth Avenue, Prabal Gurung, John Varvatos, True Religion, Rag & Bone, Scott Kay, 7 for All Mankind, J Brand, Lululemon, Splendid, Ella Moss, Nicole Miller, Hudson Jeans, J.Lindberg, Rich & Skinny, Paige Denim, C&C California, Fox, Disney, Sony Pictures Entertainment, AT&T Entertainment Group, InterActive Corp, Deloitte etc.

The brands of products dealt with: Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Gucci, Dior, Valentino, Bottega Veneta, Christian Louboutin, Prada, Dolce&Gabbana, Saint Laurent, Burberry, Fendi, Jimmy Choo, Salvatore Ferragamo, Moschino, Giuseppe Zanotti, Judith Leiber, Celine, Loewe, Balenciaga, Moynat, Versace, Givenchy, Missoni, Ted Baker, Stella McCartney, Stuart Weitzman, Moncler, The Row, Tory Burch, Alexander McQueen etc.

jobs.title: Strategy Consulting | PE, M&A Analyst Intern (Fashion)
jobs.description:
A fashion consulting firm in startup stage with a growing team from some of the top universities and institutions is looking for a dedicated, highly strategic, creative, analytical and quantitative problem-solving consultant as Strategy Consulting Intern. You are passionate about fashion, management consulting, growth and digital strategy, market research, financial analysis, multi-channel marketing strategy, Ecommerce and retail strategy, social media and influencer marketing, PR, data analytics, operations, supply chain, merchandising and client relationship; motivated with a startup, innovative mindset. This role has the potential to grow into head and other management roles within a few months for the top candidate as the business continues expanding internationally.

We set our bars high in building a premier global management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele – leading and emerging luxury/fashion brands, fashion media, online companies and brands. We offer a combination of traditional services such as fashion PR, celebrity marketing, branding, global marketing communication, retail strategy, fashion creatives as well as growth and digital strategy, social media growth and content strategy, influencer marketing, Ecommerce, fashion tech, innovative store concepts, financial analysis, supply chain/operations/merchandising strategy and data analytics.

Company leadership has experience with luxury fashion brands, celebrity designers, leading fortune 500 media/entertainment companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Your Background -
Candidates major in business, marketing, economics, finance(corporate finance, equity research, Private Equity, M&A), fashion business, technology (fashion tech, Ecommerce technology, future store concepts, retail technology, virtual reality, augmented reality, hologram etc.) and data analytics (statistics, AI, machine learning, web/social media analytics, big data) or other relevant fields from top universities and fashion/art institutes.

Who should apply:
Those who specializes or is talented in at least one of the following areas –
Strategic consulting, business management
Growth strategy, digital strategy
Financial and economic analysis, equity research
Private Equity (PE), Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A)
Market research, competitive analysis
Marketing strategy, marketing intelligence and analytics
Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts
Retail strategy, trend forecasting, creative direction, merchandising, supply chain, production process and operations, manufacturers
Fashion PR, celebrity marketing, event organization, nonprofit initiatives
Social media, influencer marketing, Content creation
Statistics, AI, machine learning, analytics, big data, forecasting, personalization, segmentation
Business development, account management, B2B sales

Responsibilities:
Support both in house and client facing responsibilities whether it is strategic analysis, growth strategy, market research, marketing strategy, financial and investment analysis, merchandising, supply chain, operations research, consulting, business development and client relations.

Assisting the Managing Director and help in various aspects of planning, preparation, operations and logistics of the business to facilitate various business activities.

Management consulting: find opportunities through research and analysis; strategically advise and consult clients on growth strategy and revenue gains.

Branding: brainstorm and come up with branding ideas for company and the clients.

Growth and digital strategy, marketing mix, operation and supply chain: use a combination of marketing, cross channel, operational, product, financial & data analytics measures to help our clients grow their business and revenue, find the right marketing mix and supply chain/operational strategy.

Market research and competitive analysis, marketing strategy: conduct exhaustive market research and SWOT analysis to come up with business strategies and competitive advantages for the company and clients. Work with the finance and data analytics team to come up with creative and innovative marketing strategies and ideas.

Financial and economic analysis, equity research, private equity, M&A: analyze potential client performance through annual report, balance sheet, income statement and other equity research. Identify problems and opportunities for improvement. Work together with the market research and marketing strategy team to tie prospects’ issues and problems with potential revenue gains through our solutions. Private equity and M&A analysis to identify business expansion and investment opportunities. Statistics number crunching.

Marketing and data analytics: expert in statistics, AI, machine learning technologies and marketing intelligence to help clients gain insights and better forecast, segment, target and personalize their customers’ experience.

Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts: familiar with Ecommerce management, strategy and the latest technologies in Ecommerce, Fashion tech, innovative and futuristic store concepts. Come up with innovative retail store or shopping concepts for clients.

Fashion PR: research to find the right editors and publications to pitch about the company itself for news coverage and interviews. Research to pitch and land speaking engagement for the company at conferences and events. Find opportunities for collaborations and partnership. Outreaches to grow the firm.

Fashion PR consulting: Provide PR service to the clients. Pitch media and land product placement. Celebrity seeding and red carpet dressing. Write press releases and pitches.Event planning. 

Event organization, nonprofit initiatives: fashion and gala event organization. Celebrity relations. Nonprofit initiatives for the company and clients.

Social media growth and content strategy, influencer marketing: Managing social media, partnership and influencer activities to raise awareness of the firm and promote our consulting services. Build and grow a community with potential clients and advocates. Increase audience engagement. 

Provide social media and influencer marketing services to the clients. Help clients with their social media account growth, content creation and strategy.
Retail, supply chain, merchandising, operations strategy.

Create sales and marketing process/pipelines to help market the firm’s services to potential clients. Deploy marketing technologies to make the process efficient and effective.

Business development and client relations: identify opportunities to grow the company client base; conduct sales and marketing activities to generate leads and turn prospects into clients. Build and maintain relationship with fashion brands and companies. An excellent communicator and relationship builder.

Keep up to date with the latest fashion, branding, marketing, consulting, finance and economics trends and technologies. Up to date with fashion industry business, news and market trends.

The ideal candidate is highly intelligent and a quick self-learner, hardworking and dedicated, proactive and an initiative taker, creative, strategic, innovative and a good communicator.

Potential Clients -
Major fashion companies/brands, luxury brands and celebrity designers, media companies, online brands, other consulting firms and agencies.

Location –
The company has a remote structure and remote culture. Ideally candidates would be in these five cities: New York, Paris, London, Los Angeles, Stockholm. Candidates can however be 100% remote. Being in these major cities comes with the benefits of participating in face to face meetings and planning. You should be able to start in the next couple of weeks in order to apply.

Note: candidates in Paris, London, Stockholm and LA can also apply to this role.

Availability –
Can dedicate at least 2-3 days a week on this adventure.

Compensation –
Unpaid first with the potential to grow into commission and salaried role.

About US –
Haus of Jaeger is set to become a premier, multi-divisional fashion strategy consulting firm. The firm starts with its core strategy division: PR, branding, communications, celebrity marketing, social media and influencer marketing, global marketing communications, fashion media, growth & digital strategy, Ecommerce, retail strategy and fashion tech. It will then grow later with a new fashion creative division in short form content, visual art and TV production.

We set our bars high in building a premier management consulting firm in fashion with top clientele –Major fashion companies/brands, luxury brands and celebrity designers, media companies, online brands. Company leadership has experience with celebrity designers, luxury fashion brands, leading fortune 500 media/entertainment companies and is advised by McKinsey partner, Goldman Sachs strategy executive and serial entrepreneurs.

Past companies we worked with include: Vanity Fair, Saks Fifth Avenue, Prabal Gurung, John Varvatos, True Religion, Rag & Bone, Scott Kay, 7 for All Mankind, J Brand, Lululemon, Splendid, Ella Moss, Nicole Miller, Hudson Jeans, J.Lindberg, Rich & Skinny, Paige Denim, C&C California, Fox, Disney, Sony Pictures Entertainment, AT&T Entertainment Group, InterActive Corp, Deloitte etc.

The brands of products dealt with: Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Gucci, Dior, Valentino, Bottega Veneta, Christian Louboutin, Prada, Dolce&Gabbana, Saint Laurent, Burberry, Fendi, Jimmy Choo, Salvatore Ferragamo, Moschino, Giuseppe Zanotti, Judith Leiber, Celine, Loewe, Balenciaga, Moynat, Versace, Givenchy, Missoni, Ted Baker, Stella McCartney, Stuart Weitzman, Moncler, The Row, Tory Burch, Alexander McQueen etc.

Company leader has been trained with some of the most successful business leaders and celebrity entrepreneurs such as Steve Wozniak, Sylvester Stallone, Tony Robbins, Michael Douglas, Dr. Phil, Mark Wahlberg, Bethenny Frankel, Pitbull, Jessica Simpson, Charlie Sheen, Huge Hilton, George Ross, Gene Simmons, John Travolta, Christie Brinkley, Lubov Azria, Emily Weiss etc.
